p: The cytotoxic activities of DCW and DCT were analyzed for their potential roles as antineoplastic agents. The wild samples originated from stem tissue and the in vitro samples from protocorms. The methanol extracts of D. chryseum, for both wild and in vitro-grown samples, showed significant cytotoxic activities (Figures 2 â€“ 4) for the investigated cancer indications compared to an alkylating standard-of-care cytostatic therapeutic as the control. The results are summarized in Table 3.
